name: RuneGuard
description:
RuneGuard is a top-down RPG about the lands of Zimmeros...

GAME FEATURES

• Explore Zimmeros and fight to protect it from the coming Darkness...

• Fight increasingly more difficult creatures as they become ever more influenced by the Dark powers...

• Find out who (or what) is behind it all!

• Gather all 8 Runes to fully assemble the RuneGuard.

•  Vanquish the Darkness and save Zimmeros!

DEMO FEATURES

• Gather some equipment in your hometown of Paradak

• Fight your way through the (once) majestic forest, now plagued by Dark Creatures..

• Gather a few friends, save a temple, and have an epic rap battle!
